programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Tee John enjoy a tour of the Midlands. In Walsall, they have a money-spinning idea, in Birmingham Drew finds treasure and they also explore a grand country house

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew is in Lancashire, checking out a factory making traditional soap and, in rural Dorset, he visits a couple selling antiques from a manor house linked to the Churchill family

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard visits a huge collection of 20th Century designer furniture in a former paper mill in West Yorkshire, and finds pattern moulds in Middlesbroughs last brass foundry

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and James Braxton are on a buying spree on the Isle of Wight, where Raj unravels the tale of one former famous local and James takes a peek beneath the waves

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Brenton West and Will Kirk set to work on Olympic diver Jack Laughers gold and silver medals, along with their wooden cases, which have taken a battering over the years, while Steve Fletcher turns his attention to a precious musical jewellery box that was bought by Barry for his wife Bernadette while he was in Malaysia with the British Army more than 50 years ago. Amanda Middleditch and Julie Tatchell are next to be called into action, this time against a mythical monster in need of some TLC, and metal worker Dominic Chinea is handed a complicated fix on a simple tool

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team mark the year of the Queens Platinum Jubilee by bringing four treasured heirlooms, each with a royal connection, back to life. Amongst the items is an unfinished Pearly Suit belonging to a womans late father, who was a Pearly King, and a hand-painted commemorative plate made to celebrate the Golden Jubilee of Queen Victoria in 1887

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Upcycling expert Jay Blades uses his salvaging expertise at Altrincham Recycling Centre to search for three items that he can clean up and reinvent. Blacksmith Kev Paxton takes on the challenge of a metal window box in need of a complete makeover, while design team Josh Kennard and Oli Milne are challenged with finding a new use for some stepladders. Jay sees the value in some old tiles - but will he be able to turn all three items into money makers? Narrated by Arthur Smith

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell help Joselyn Taylor, who has been searching for her elder brother James to find out why she was put in a childrens home at two weeks old. James in turn has also been searching for the father he never knew and had only been able to dream about

Together, they set to work transforming the True Colours performing arts school, an inclusive dance school that teaches dance and theatre skills to 500 children and young adults weekly, many of whom have disabilities and learning needs. The school has grown substantially over time and theyve completely outgrown their existing space, so the team get to work renovating a run-down old boys club that would give the dance school the extra space it so desperately needs to continue to transform more young lives

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Struggling to cope with his alter ego Venom, Eddie Brock attempts to re-ignite his journalistic career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady. However, Kasady becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution. Comic-book fantasy sequel, directed by Andy Serkis and starring Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson and Michelle Williams

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venoms hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Stephen Graham and Juno Temple

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago. Fantasy adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris and Malin Akerman

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin OBrien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoffs complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the worlds most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: While exploring space for new worlds, a probe belonging to the Life Foundation discovers a comet covered in symbiotic lifeforms. Following the probes return to Earth, journalist Eddie Brock investigates sinister trials being carried out by the corporation, and after being infected by an alien symbiote, develops superhuman strength and power. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy and Riz Ahmed

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Struggling to cope with his alter ego Venom, Eddie Brock attempts to re-ignite his journalistic career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady. However, Kasady becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution. Comic-book fantasy sequel, directed by Andy Serkis and starring Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson and Michelle Williams

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venoms hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Stephen Graham and Juno Temple

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of meta-humans to stand against supervillain Steppenwolf, but despite the help of Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash, it may already be too late to save the planet. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot and Henry Cavill

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Wide-eyed kitten Garfield is abandoned by his father Vic and left in an alleyway. Years later, when the ginger moggie has been adopted by long-suffering human Jon Arbuckle, a case of catnapping reunites the pet with his crooked father. Before long, the feline and doggy pal Odie are forced to take part in a heist. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A prince and princess have been expected to marry each other all their lives, a prospect they dreaded as children but which they came to look forward to as adults. However, an evil wizard captures the princess and turns her into a swan. Everyone else believes she is dead, but her betrothed sets out to bring her home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Jack Palance and John Cleese

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs Mutants
programme.desc: The Dark Knight battles old enemies who have been transformed into giant monsters. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Oded Fehr

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The dark knight joins forces with a team of superheroes including Green Arrow and The Flash to battle the mastermind behind a horse of deadly robotic animals. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Chris Diamantopoulos

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a cars exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. This stroke of luck allows him to realise his dream of competing against human drivers in the prestigious Indianapolis 500 race. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: A village of Yetis lives on the top of a mountain in the Himalayas, hidden away from sight. An epic journey ensues when one of the clan named Migo stumbles across a real human being - but is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him. Animated adventure, with the voices of Channing Tatum and James Corden

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: A hero is needed to defend a peaceful valley community from attack by a rampaging snow leopard. The unlikely candidate for the job is a lazy panda, who enlists the aid of a legendary team of animal fighters and their wise master to teach him the martial arts skills he needs to fulfil his destiny. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane and Jackie Chan

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his towns weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: A scientist believes he has saved the world from his invention, a machine that accidentally turned water into food. However, he learns the device is still active and has created a race of food/animal hybrids that he must stop from running wild across the world. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Piece By Piece
programme.desc: Pharrell Williams tells the story of his life - through the lens of Lego animation. With an all-star cast, including Kendrick Lamar, Gwen Stefani and Snoop Dogg

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: Tom and Vini are mice who stow away on Noahs ark. They must use their musical talents to enter a competition and help maintain peace among the animals. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Rodrigo Santoro and Marcelo Adnet

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! To The Movies
programme.desc: Five teenage superheroes, miffed by the fact they arent deemed worthy enough for their own big screen films, set out to prove themselves by tackling the villainous Slade and his maniacal plan for world domination. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Greg Cipes, Scott Menville, Khary Payton, Will Arnett and Nicolas Cage

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a storm wrecks their home, a speedy sloth called Laura and her eccentric family move to the big city in their rusted food truck in the hope of making their business a success. Animated adventure, with the voices of Leslie Jones and Remy Hii

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his towns weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

An epic journey ensues when one of the clan named Migo stumbles across a real human being - but is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him. Animated adventure, with the voices of Channing Tatum and James Corden

Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind hopes to seal his reputation as the greatest villain of them all by stealing the Moon. First he needs to get his hands on a shrinking ray owned by a rival evil genius, and adopts three orphan girls to help him - but finds that fatherhood brings out his long-buried caring side. Animated comedy, with the voices of Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand and Julie Andrews

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: In a world of living ideograms, multi-expressional emoji Gene embarks on a daring mission to find notorious hacker Jailbreak. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of TJ Miller, James Corden and Patrick Stewart

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: A scientist believes he has saved the world from his invention, a machine that accidentally turned water into food. However, he learns the device is still active and has created a race of food/animal hybrids that he must stop from running wild across the world. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.title: Piece By Piece
programme.desc: Pharrell Williams tells the story of his life - through the lens of Lego animation. With an all-star cast, including Kendrick Lamar, Gwen Stefani and Snoop Dogg

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: Tom and Vini are mice who stow away on Noahs ark. They must use their musical talents to enter a competition and help maintain peace among the animals. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Rodrigo Santoro and Marcelo Adnet

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! To The Movies
programme.desc: Five teenage superheroes, miffed by the fact they arent deemed worthy enough for their own big screen films, set out to prove themselves by tackling the villainous Slade and his maniacal plan for world domination. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Greg Cipes, Scott Menville, Khary Payton, Will Arnett and Nicolas Cage

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: Lex Luthor poses a threat to Teen Titans and DC Super Hero Girls, who reunite to combat Supermans arch enemy. Animated adventure, with the voices of Kimberly Brooks, Greg Cipes and Will Friedle

programme.title: Rebellious
programme.desc: A princess is kidnapped by an evil sorcerer and her scholarly fiance must use his wits in an epic quest to find her, while she boldly challenges her captors and plots a daring escape. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Vanessa Johansson and Marc Thompson

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her recently widowed grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home. Festive family drama, starring James Cromwell and Darcey Ewart

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary boy, with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side, sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father, who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm. Festive family adventure, starring Henry Lawfull, Toby Jones, Sally Hawkins and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: A child is taken in by kind-hearted Santa and raised as an elf - so it comes as a shock when he discovers years later that he is in fact human. Deciding to get back to his roots, he heads off for New York in search of his long-lost family, but is ill-prepared for the hustle and bustle of the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, starring Will Ferrell, James Caan, Zooey Deschanel and Edward Asner

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rivals in the bookshop business fall in love over the internet, unaware they know and dislike each other in the real world. While things remain frosty in person, the pairs anonymous online relationship continues to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Greg Kinnear, Parker Posey and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: An American householder is dismayed when his plans for a traditional festive family holiday are thrown into complete disarray by a succession of annoying neighbours and long-lost relatives, who turn up on his doorstep offering their own brand of Christmas cheer. Comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Beverly DAngelo, Randy Quaid, Diane Ladd, Juliette Lewis, Miriam Flynn, Johnny Galecki and William Hickey

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters are raised by their strong-willed mother while their father is away fighting in the American Civil War. Although one yearns to become a writer and another dreams of being married, the girls remain firmly united as the family steers a course through hard times and tragic events. Period drama, based on Louisa May Alcotts novel, with Winona Ryder, Susan Sarandon, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: A woman moves in with her brother and his family after her latest break-up. She begins a relationship with a drug dealer who babysits the couples two-year-old son, while also trying to persuade her sister-in-law that she needs to try and get more out of her life. Comedy drama, starring Anna Kendrick, Melanie Lynskey and Lena Dunham

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: A New York borough is shut down during a blizzard - and a group of cheeky local children steal a snowplough in a desperate attempt to ensure the roads to their school stay closed as long as possible. Meanwhile, parents all over the city struggle to work out what to do with their offspring. Comedy, starring Chris Elliott, Mark Webber, Jean Smart, Chevy Chase, Iggy Pop, Pam Grier and Zena Grey

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: A married couple from Chicago decide to steer clear of the usual festive celebrations and keep their cash for a holiday in the sun, prompting a busybody neighbour to call on the local community to pull out all the stops to make them change their minds. Festive comedy based on a novel by John Grisham, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Tim Allen, Dan Aykroyd and M Emmet Walsh

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas In Wonderland
programme.desc: As the Queen of Hearts has outlawed the festive season, with the help of a curious young Alice, Father Christmas attempts to put things right. Lewis Carroll-inspired animated adventure, with the voices of Gerard Butler, Emilia Clarke and Simone Ashley

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Little Women

Although one yearns to become a writer and another dreams of being married, the girls remain firmly united as the family steers a course through hard times and tragic events. Period drama, based on Louisa May Alcotts novel, with Winona Ryder, Susan Sarandon, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: A workaholic enlists the help of a magical genie to help win his family back before Christmas. Remake of Richard Curtiss 1991 comedy Bernard and the Genie, starring Melissa McCarthy, Paapa Essiedu and Alan Cumming

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: A married couple from Chicago decide to steer clear of the usual festive celebrations and keep their cash for a holiday in the sun, prompting a busybody neighbour to call on the local community to pull out all the stops to make them change their minds. Festive comedy based on a novel by John Grisham, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Tim Allen, Dan Aykroyd and M Emmet Walsh

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A primary school teacher enters his class in a Song for Christmas competition, and ends up having to lead the busload of excitable kids - as well as his irresponsible teaching assistant - on a disastrous trip to Wales for the event. The journey also leads to an unwanted confrontation with his high-flying twin brother. Comedy sequel, starring David Tennant, Marc Wootton, Joanna Page and Jessica Hynes

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude, Wheres My Donkey?!
programme.desc: The pupils of St Bernadettes face a new challenge as Christmas approaches, when their new teacher loses his memory, forgetting everything about the festive season and that he is about to get married. It falls to the kids, led by excitable teacher Mr Poppy, to help him remember both in time for the wedding. Comedy sequel, starring Martin Clunes, Catherine Tate, Marc Wootton and Celia Imrie

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The discovery of an ancient relic leads the Ghostbusters old and new to join forces to stop a second ice age. Supernatural comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Rudd, Carrie Coon, Mckenna Grace and Finn Wolfhard

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Two bored youngsters are led on a series of zany misadventures when a manic moggy comes knocking at their door with a magical stovepipe hat on his head and mischief in mind. Comedy fantasy based on the childrens book by Dr Seuss, starring Mike Myers, Alec Baldwin, Dakota Fanning and Spencer Breslin

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: British wizard Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York City with a bagful of magical creatures as part of a global study of fantastic beasts, but gets caught up in a conflict when some of the creatures in his care are accidentally released after an inadvertent switching of suitcases with a baker. With a strange, dark force terrorising the Big Apple, Newt needs to find some allies to help him round up the beasts, while saving his own skin in the meantime. Harry Potter prequel written for the screen by JK Rowling, starring Eddie Redmayne, with Katherine Waterston, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton, Jon Voight, Dan Fogler and Carmen Ejogo

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the childrens books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leaders plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Childrens fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When 12-year-old Rob Horton discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild and life begins to change in the most unexpected ways. With the help of a wise and mysterious maid, and the stubborn new girl in school, he navigates through childhood memories, heartache, and wondrous adventures. Family drama, starring Dennis Quaid, Queen Latifah, Christian Convery and Madalen Mills

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: A single father is determined to become a police officer but fails the medical because he is overweight. To compensate, he goes to absurd lengths to succeed in his job as a security guard, but when criminals lay siege to his place of work, he finds his opportunity to prove his worth to law enforcement. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Keir ODonnell

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Sam, a fearless young girl raised outside of her Maori culture, is determined to connect with a mountain in the hope it can cure her cancer. Along the way she meets new friends Mallory and Bronco. Co-writer/director Rachel Houses comedy, starring Elizabeth Atkinson, Reuben Francis, Terence Daniel and Byron Coll

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leaders plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Childrens fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A boy begins to doubt whether Father Christmas really exists as he waits for the sound of sleigh bells on Christmas Eve. But he and hundreds of other lucky children receive a shock when a magical steam engine arrives in the night to take them to the North Pole and meet the man himself. Robert Zemeckis animated adventure, based on Chris Van Allsburgs book, features the voices of Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis and Eddie Deezen

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the childrens books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: A young girl called named Bea goes through a difficult time with her father and suddenly gains the ability to see imaginary friends (IFs). Bea learns her upstairs neighbour Cal also possesses the same power and they join forces to matchmake IFs with new children. Fantasy adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds and Cailey Fleming, with John Krasinski, who also wrote and directed

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A drilling operation unleashes a subterranean creature which feeds on oil. The monster bonds with a monster truck which a local teenager is building from spare parts, and the youngster befriends the beast and helps it to return to its underground home. Fantasy adventure, starring Lucas Till and Jane Levy

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The hapless fool is employed as a security guard for a British art gallery and is sent to Los Angeles to bring back a famous painting. Unfortunately, he finds himself mistaken for a renowned art professor and invited to make an important presentation. Mel Smiths British comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Burt Reynolds, Peter MacNicol, John Mills, Peter Capaldi and June Brown

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Sam, a fearless young girl raised outside of her Maori culture, is determined to connect with a mountain in the hope it can cure her cancer. Along the way she meets new friends Mallory and Bronco. Co-writer/director Rachel Houses comedy, starring Elizabeth Atkinson, Reuben Francis, Terence Daniel and Byron Coll

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones goes in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a biblical artefact of devastating power. His quest leads him to Egypt, where the Nazis are plotting to use the Ark to further Hitlers plans for world domination - aided by Joness deceitful French rival. The first of five big-screen action adventures, starring Harrison Ford as Indy, with Karen Allen, Paul Freeman and John Rhys-Davies

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist, with his young sidekick and a nightclub singer in tow, is stranded in India, where he takes on a mission to recover magical sacred stones from the hands of an evil cult engaged in human sacrifice and child slavery. Steven Spielbergs action adventure, starring Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan and Amrish Puri

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: An Amazon princess who grows up in enchanted realm has her first encounter with the outside world during the First World War. American airman Steve Trevor crash lands on her isolated island home. Determined to bring the chaos sweeping the world to an end, she ventures onto the front line in an attempt to bring down an ancient and powerful evil force that is driving the human race towards destruction. Director Patty Jenkins blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Gal Gadot, Chris Pine and David Thewlis

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: A fledgling superhero crash-lands on Earth after evacuation from his home planet and is taken in by an elderly couple who raise him as their own. But with adolescence comes a greater understanding of his superhuman powers, leading to his rebirth as a crusader for justice and defender of the American way of life. Comic-strip adventure, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Marlon Brando

However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mothers heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly travels to the 21st century, where he has to save his children from a terrible fate. However, this proves to have unforeseen consequences when the future version of arch enemy Biff sees a chance to rewrite history for his own benefit, leaving Marty stuck in a twisted parallel universe. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly is transported back to the days of the Wild West, where he strives to save his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown from death at the hands of a villainous gunslinger. Final instalment in the sci-fi comedy trilogy, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen and Thomas F Wilson

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Theatrical cut of Ridley Scotts sci-fi thriller, originally released in cinemas, starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mothers decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin

programme.title: A Newport Christmas
programme.desc: A charitable and spirited Newport socialite in 1905 dreams of using her cash to start a foundation to help others in town. Romantic drama, starring Wes Brown and Ginna Claire Mason

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Greens thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa Azion

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mothers first date in years takes a chilling turn when shes bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: My Dead Friend Zoe
programme.desc: An Afghanistan veteran comes head to head with her Vietnam vet grandfather at the familys lake house. Comedy drama, starring Sonequa Martin-Green (The Walking Dead), Natalie Morales and Ed Harris

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher

Director Christopher Landons thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa Azion

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planets surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Hos sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster epic, starring John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandwie Newton.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: A fugitive is left for dead by his treacherous followers on a dangerous world full of lethal predators. He lures bounty hunters to the planet in the hope of killing them and stealing their spacecraft, but finds himself forced to work with them against an attack by the monsters at the top of the food chain. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Katee Sackhoff

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: The Man of Steel battles an evil tycoon, who has recruited a computer genius to aid his schemes for world domination. Together the villains hatch a plan to dispose of Superman once and for all - but instead of killing the superhero, they accidentally unveil his dark side. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father, only to discover his shallow grave is now empty. Thriller, starring Daniel Portman, Brian Vernel and Paul Higgins

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell

Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandwie Newton.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: A drifter in a post-apocalyptic wasteland encounters a crazed, sadistic warlord and his radiation-afflicted cult. He assists a warrior who has turned against the tyrant, and liberates five women who have been forced to become his brides. Together, they make a desperate journey through the desert to salvation, with their enemies in hot pursuit. Reboot of the sci-fi thriller franchise, starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: A father and his two sons face off against terrifying creatures in a remote farmhouse. Director Benjamin Brewers dystopian horror thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Jaeden Martell and Maxwell Jenkins

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two teenagers murder a random victim for their own amusement, convinced nobody will ever suspect them of committing such a senseless crime, and ensure all the evidence points to a drug dealer. However, they reckon without a suspicious and determined detective and her partner. Thriller, starring Sandra Bullock, Ryan Gosling and Michael Pitt

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Following in the footsteps of brother Danny, light-fingered Debbie Ocean plans to steal the Toussaint, a $150million necklace from Vogues Met Gala, with the help of a famous actress. Crime caper, starring Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway and Mindy Kaling

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppolas gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: The Godfather Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michaels story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppolas Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale and Lee Strasberg

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his familys Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Francis Ford Coppolas crime drama sequel, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach and Bridget Fonda

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote dAzur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcocks romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis

programme.title: Paradise Highway
programme.desc: Sally is a truck driver who is forced to smuggle illegal cargo to save her brother from a lethal prison gang. With FBI operatives on her trail, Sallys conscience is challenged when the last package turns out to be a teenage girl. Drama, starring Juliette Binoche, Frank Grillo and Hala Finley

programme.title: Mona Lisa and the Blood Moon
programme.desc: A girl with unusual powers escapes from a mental asylum and rejoins the chaos of modern-day civilisation, on the hedonistic streets of the French Quarter in New Orleans. Mystery thriller, directed by Ana Lily Amirpour and starring Ed Skrein, Kate Hudson, Craig Robinson and Jeon Jong-seo

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside towns tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chiefs efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielbergs thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patients fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalans thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientists formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: A series of interlinked stories about the Los Angeles underworld. A hitman plays minder to his bosss wife, and he and his partner deal with a dead body following a mishap with a gun. Meanwhile, a washed-up boxer goes on the run after refusing to throw a fight, and two lovers plot a hold-up in a diner. Quentin Tarantinos crime drama, starring John Travolta, Samuel L Jackson, Uma Thurman, Bruce Willis, Ving Rhames, Tim Roth and Amanda Plummer

programme.title: Killer in My Village
programme.desc: The horrific case of Georgina Edmonds, a pensioner and grandmother who was bludgeoned to death by Matthew Hamlen

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: A profile of the cold-blooded killer John Sweeney, nicknamed the Canal Killer due to the places he dumped the body parts of his victims

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: A profile of the Rhode Island family man and Sunday school teacher Christopher Hightower, who turned out to be a cold-blooded triple murderer

programme.title: Murders That Shocked the Nation
programme.desc: The exploits of Scottish murderer and trickster Archibald Hall, who posed as a butler to steal from his employers, and killed a felon who threatened to reveal his criminal past. He later murdered a wealthy former MP and his wife after they had employed his services and was finally arrested for his crimes in January 1978

programme.title: The Seventies
programme.desc: Documentary examining the American politics, culture and historic events during the 1970s, beginning with a look at how TV was revolutionised with the rise of innovative childrens programming as well as the arrival of Monty Python, Saturday Night Live and Monday Night Football

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: The life and career of the English actor, who was nominated for Academy Awards for his roles in Mr Smith Goes to Washington, Casablanca, Mr. Skeffington and Notorious

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of Quentin Tarantino, whose films include Reservoir Dogs, Pulp Fiction, Django Unchained and Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

programme.title: Positive
programme.desc: Documentary charting the history of HIV in Britain, beginning with a look at how the first recorded UK case in 1981 provoked panic and hostility. People caught up in events, including Jonathan Blake, one of the first HIV patients in the UK, reveal in vivid detail how they confronted the disease that would go on to change Britain

programme.title: Positive
programme.desc: A look at how the first government-sponsored national AIDS awareness appeared to cut through some of the prejudice, but the lack of effective medicine or vaccine hits hard

programme.title: Positive
programme.desc: Documentary telling the story of Britains 40-year battle with HIV, from the first recorded UK case in 1981 right through to the present day

programme.title: Murder at the Cottage
programme.desc: False leads muddy the investigation into Sophies murder. Despite having more than 50 initial suspects, no charges are made

programme.title: Bad Host: Hunting the Couchsurfing Predator
programme.desc: This is the story of young women, unbeknownst to each other, who were all victims of a serving Italian police officer who lured them to stay with him using Couchsurfing, a website where travellers can find trustworthy hosts to put them up in their homes for free. Tracing each other through the internet, the women united and battled for six years, often in the face of indifference in their home countries, to bring him to justice

programme.title: Murder in Boston: Roots, Rampage and Reckoning
programme.desc: Examining the 1989 murder of Carol Stuart and the investigation that followed, which ignited racial tensions due to her husbands claims that the assailant was black

programme.title: Murder at the Cottage
programme.desc: The investigation intensifies as the French authorities take over and a battle between judicial systems looms large

programme.title: Murder at the Cottage

programme.title: The Ringleader: The Case of the Bling Ring

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: The presenter explores some of the worlds most unusual and fascinating customs, including riding tree trunks down slopes, hosting a buffet for monkeys and a food fight of epic proportions

programme.sub-title: The Pyramid Tool Kit, the Killer Foot Machine and the Lost Head
programme.desc: One hundred and fifty years ago a strange set of objects were found in the Great Pyramid in Giza. A piece of cedar wood with regular marks etched along its length, a two-pronged bronze hook with two pins sticking into it, and a baseball-sized sphere made of granite

programme.title: Digging Up Britains Past
programme.desc: Helen Skelton and Alex Langlands, along with a team of archeologists, explore fascinating periods in British history through a current archaeological dig. In the first episode, Helen and Alex head for the island of Lindisfarne, where archaeologists are trying to locate the site of an eighth-century monastery. Among their finds is a graveyard and a number of skeletons, which may be those of both monks and pilgrims

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: River detectorist Beau Ouimette and presenter and keen swimmer Rick Edwards go in search of evidence of the clashing Scottish clans embroiled in the civil war that raged across the British Isles in the 17th century. Fights erupted during this period between the Royalists supporting the King and the Covenanters wanting more power for church and state. Starting on the River Lochy, situated in the shadow of Ben Nevis, the pair hunt for evidence of the 1645 Battle of Inverlochy - a pivotal fight that saw the Royalist army launch a surprise attack against the ill-prepared Covenanters

programme.title: A Ship Through Time
programme.sub-title: A Ship Through Time: Secrets of the Newport Ship
programme.desc: Part two of two. Sean Fletcher investigates the secrets of a shipwrecked 15th-century trading galleon found by accident off Newport in 2002, her international significance and how two of Europes most turbulent and violent wars shaped her fate. He discovers what this trading galleon carried, and to where and a possible powerful owner. He also sheds light on a possible connection to the Wars of the Roses

programme.title: Hazardous History with Henry Winkler
programme.desc: A nostalgic journey through Americas past reveals a time when any and all cures could be advertised and sold to the public indiscriminately, without any redress being offered when they failed. Henry dives into a world where animal skin could replace ones own and where doctors gave coffee enemas

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.desc: An epic journey through the birth of the American West, examining the relentless competition for land, power, and identity that forged a nations history, spanning a century of pivotal events. The host reflects on late 18th-century war leader Chief Little Turtles battle to resist American expansion into the Northwest Territory. This represented a struggle for sovereignty and survival for the Native American tribes during a time of great change. The stakes were high as Chief Little Turtle rallied his people, showcasing their bravery and determination

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.desc: Hunter and explorer John Colter, who was one of the first Americans to explore the West. He later entered the booming fur trade. When he repeatedly ignored warnings from the Blackfeet Indians tribe about hunting sacred beaver on their land, he was taken captive and forced to make a run for his life

programme.desc: Dusty and Lupe pedal their way to an auction in Fullerton, but end up needing the truck. Darrell pins his hopes on a small locker for which he overpaid. Rene makes the most of the Honeymoon unit and things get a bit racy

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Back in Montebello, Gunter comes along to help Rene, who wont give him the time of day. Darrell tries to make Kimber his queen, while Ivy and his boys Rochambeau their way to solid showing

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Does a Bear Bid in the Woods?
programme.desc: Kenny makes his way out to the mountains, constantly watching out for cougars. Lisa scores on a small sister locker, but its Brandi who gets the nomination for buyer of the week

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy kidnaps Pops and takes him to Rosamond, where they deftly score a fine locker. Kenny sets out to brighten everyones day and his clowning around has him seeing stars. Lisa proves she has a friend - for now

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: Documentary series focusing on six unfathomable mysteries - from a gigantic tsunami that never hits land, to a sinister blood-red lake in war-torn Baghdad

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Brandon goes solo as an abandoned recording studio comes up for sale, while the heat is on when bidders clash over a trailer containing Civil War items

programme.title: Battle Treasures with Foxy and Bruce
programme.desc: Jason Fox and Bruce Crompton examine the stories behind some of the rarest and most remarkable military artefacts ever discovered

programme.title: Titanic: A Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: As the Titanic started to sink in April 1912, another ship came into view, offering her passengers the hope of being rescued. However, despite a fusillade of rockets, the ship turned away. Within two hours, 1,500 people were dead. An American investigation at the time accused the SS Californian, even though the freighter was stationary that night. A British inquiry concurred, keen to shift blame from national failures on lifeboat provision and steamship supervision. However, since Titanics wreck was discovered, the mystery began to unlock, and now, with recently discovered clues, a new suspect has emerged: the SS Mount Temple. This documentary follows a range of experts, using the latest investigative tools, as they examine these new clues and revisit the evidence from 1912 to take a fresh look at the cold case of the 20th century

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.desc: The lives of Protestant missionaries Marcus and Narcissa Whitman, who sought to spread their Christian faith and bring their way of life to the Cayuse people. They helped facilitate the colonisation of the Oregon Country via the Oregon Trail before ultimately being killed during an attack on the mission site in 1847

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.desc: Cynthia Ann Parker, Naduah, Narua, or Preloch, was a woman who was captured, aged around nine, by a Comanche band during the Fort Parker massacre in 1836, in which several of her relatives were killed. The crime triggered a series of increasingly deadly confrontations between her Comanche captors and the newly independent Texas

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick seeks a good deal for a painting supposedly created by artist Rene Magritte. In order to have it authenticated, he and Chum must head to Belgium. Corey tries to score on a Tom Brady Pro Bowl jersey and Seiko watch
